revised_title: Description and Comparison of the Yellow Gurnard and Red Gurnard Fishes
tldr: Edward Tyson describes and compares the Yellow Gurnard and Red Gurnard fishes, focusing on their physical characteristics, such as body shape, fins, and coloration. He also discusses the differences in their scales, gills, and other features, and notes the unique spout-like openings on the back of the Yellow Gurnard's head.
